body.name: White Side Table, Small End Table with Storage Shelf, 3-Tier Nightstand Bedside Table Bookshelf Bookcase Display Rack for Small Spaces Bedroom Bathroom Living Room Office

features: 【Versatile and Multi-Functional】Our 3-tier side table is perfect for any room in your home. Use it as a nightstand in your bedroom, an end table for holding snacks in the living room, a bookshelf in your study, or even as a storage unit for toiletries and more in your bathroom.

【Sleek and Practical Design】With its elegant yet functional design, this night stand complements any home decor. The double X-shaped design adds an aesthetic touch and ensures stability. Measuring 15.7 x 9.8 x 23.6 inches when assembled, it's perfect for small spaces, while the 3-tier design offers ample storage space.

【Durable and High-Quality Materials】Crafted from premium-grade PVC board, this side table is durable and waterproof, with smooth edges that are safe for daily use. It's also resistant to fading and easy to clean, making it a practical addition to any household. Plus, it's sturdy enough to support heavy items.

【Easy to Assemble】Assembly is a breeze with this side table. Simply follow the instructions and put together the slotted areas and screw them together. No extra tools or skills are required, and you'll have them set up in no time.

【After-sales Guarantee】We stand behind the quality of our products and offer a hassle-free after-sales guarantee. If you encounter any issues during use, simply contact us through Amazon and we will do our best to resolve the problem promptly.
body.description: BYFU White Nightstand This small nightstand is made of PVC board, NOT FOAM BOARD NOT WOOD, which is very smooth, waterproof and easy to install and clean. It also can be used to store small picture books or toys for kids, or hold magazines, snacks, office supplies or other small stuffs for adults. PAY ATTENTION: Please READ ALL the description and pictures before get our end tables especially the SIZE of the side table.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: BYFU small side table is suitable for any corner of your rooms. It can be used as bedside table, slim nightstand, narrow living room table, small bathroom storage shelf, kitchen shelf, small book shelf.

BYFU White Nightstand This small nightstand is made of PVC board, NOT FOAM BOARD NOT WOOD, which is very smooth, waterproof and easy to install and clean. It also can be used to store small picture books or toys for kids, or hold magazines, snacks, office supplies or other small stuffs for adults. PAY ATTENTION: Please READ ALL the description and pictures before get our end tables especially the SIZE of the side table. SPECIFICATIONS: Overall dimension: 15.7x9.8x23.6 inches Color: White Packing Quantity: 1 Material: PVC Special Features：lightweight, waterproof, multi-purpose

Firm Structure There is a X-shaped design on the side, which is aesthetically unique and stable enough at the same time. Lower Fence Design The design of the bottom fence of this small bookshelf ensures that books or small items do not fall out. More Space Storage 3-tier design gives the small side table a lot of storage space, suitable for narrow and small room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: Super quick to assemble. Everything needed is included...even the little screwdriver. Not very sturdy, but super cute for my purpose needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy
reviews.reviewText: While the design is cute, the material used to make it is like styrofoam. It is so cheaply made a piece came cracked and another piece broke off while I was trying to put it together. I do not recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Serves it’s purpose.
reviews.reviewText: Used as a nightstand for a lamp and other light items. Made of particle board with smooth coating of white paint. It was easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my small space!
reviews.reviewText: I just got this adoreable white bedside stand. It is perfect for my small space, and surprisingly spacious, I can even keep some of my bedtime reading books. It is really easy to assemble, it just took me about 15 minutes to fit it together and it is lightweight. Great value for the price – highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Concerns about sturdiness
reviews.reviewText: For the price, this is ok. It's technically easy to assemble, but the screws were impossible to do(at least for me) and it left me with a less than sturdy night stand. It's also a bit smaller than I expected, but overall cute and works for a small space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Read description carefully
reviews.reviewText: These are not made of wood. They aren't even made of particle board. They are like an upgraded version of the foam board used for kids science projects at the science fair. They are in a spare room to hold a lamp. They would not hold up to regular daily use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: This is no brainer. Finished it in 10mins without watching the instructions. Light weight material. So Don’t scratch it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best for the book shelf
reviews.reviewText: Value for money product. I bought this to arrange all of my books nicely. I placed my portable speaker on top of it. It added a charm to my room. Received some dust on top of the pieces but except for that one thing, overall it came nicely in the box and was easy to build in a few minutes. I used my screw driver and built it in just 10 minutes.
